Headline: #85 Central Temporary Northbound Reroute near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld
ShortDescription: NB 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt Rd/230 West
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, State and Roosevelt due to, bridge construction at Roosevelt Rd/230 West.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, State, and Roosevelt due to, bridge construction at Roosevelt Rd/230 West.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/230 West
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark, and Roosevelt due to, bridge construction near Roosevelt/230 West.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Canal, 18th, Clark, and Roosevelt due to, bridge construction near Roosevelt/230 West.

Allow extra travel time.
